Retrieve the authorizations of the authenticated user.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"query","name":"account_key","required":false,"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"access_token_issued_at":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"When the access token was issued","readOnly":true},"account":{"type":"string","description":"Account key","readOnly":true},"refresh_token_issued_at":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"When the refresh token was issued","readOnly":true},"status":{"type":"string","description":"The connections status","enum":["connected"],"readOnly":true,"title":"AuthorizationStatus"}},"required":["access_token_issued_at","account","status"],"title":"Authorization"}}}},"description":"The authorizations of the user"}}}
>
